content: NewBitcoinCity, a groundbreaking platform, brings together the best of decentralized finance (DeFi) and the power of social networks. Founded by a team of passionate developers, this platform was designed to meet the demands of a new era in digital finance. Inspired by the principles of decentralization, security, and community, NewBitcoinCity has become the place where finance and social media converge.Since its inception, NewBitcoinCity has experienced continuous growth and evolution. In a short span of time, the platform has achieved impressive milestones, surpassing even the highest expectations.Smart Contracts Audit: NewBitcoinCity recently underwent a comprehensive audit by PeckShield, a renowned blockchain security company. The platform received a high-level security certification, enhancing user trust.https://cdn.newbitcoincity.com/docs/PeckShield-Audit-Report-NBC-v1.0.pdfTVL Surge: The platform has witnessed exponential growth, reaching a remarkable 50 BTC in Total Value Locked (TVL) in record time. You can track this growth on DeFiLlama, a testament to the community's confidence in the platform.https://defillama.com/protocol/new-bitcoin-city?usdInflows=true&twitter=false&devMetrics=false&devCommits=false&groupBy=cumulativeAt the heart of the NewBitcoinCity experience is the mobile Progressive Web App (PWA), offering a wide array of features:   •   Withdrawals and Deposits: NewBitcoinCity supports deposits and withdrawals in BTC, ETH, and AVAX for maximum flexibility.    •   Key Buying and Selling: The native currency of NewBitcoinCity, Keys, can be purchased, sold, and traded to access private circles.    •   Feeds and Circles: Interact with fellow users, share content, and engage in discussions for a socially enriching experience.    •   3,3: Two users can create a unique 30-day Key commitment contract for a distinct staking experience.    •   Swap: Effortlessly exchange your Keys for other Keys to maximize flexibility.    •   Staking: Earn rewards by locking your Keys for a specific duration, enabling active participation in the platform.    •   Airdrop Points: Earn daily points for future airdrops.    •   Red Ticket and Rain Red Ticket: Offer or win Keys with these unique features.    •   Wheel and NFT Raffle: Test your luck with Key and NFT games.   •   … The team places users at the center of their approach, consistently seeking input and features for the future. The development process is iterative, with daily updates and a weekly roadmap.NewBitcoinCity is a trailblazer in the realm of SocialFi, merging the decentralized traits of cryptocurrencies with social interaction.
